hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Regime Transition Momentum
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC transitions from low-volatility (RV(20) < 25th percentile) to medium-volatility (RV(20) > 50th percentile) regime within 24 hours on expanding volume (>1.5x 20-day average), the directional move that triggered the transition will continue for another 24 hours with 65% probability, providing momentum continuation entry.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Volatility regime transitions often mark the beginning of sustained directional moves as new information enters the market. The initial burst attracts follow-through from systematic and trend-following strategies.
entry_conditions: BTC 4H RV(20) crosses above 50th percentile from below 25th percentile
Volume on transition candles > 1.5x 20-day average volume
Price has moved >2% in direction of transition
Transition occurs during US/London overlap trading hours (13:00-17:00 UTC)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 2.5% additional move in direction of entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price retraces 50% of the initial transition move

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If volatility expansion leads to immediate mean reversion (>50% retracement) within 12 hours more than 45% of the time.
